titleStmt.title: Law-power, or, The law of relation written in the heart of ministers and people by the finger of God, is mighty through Him, to prevaile with both : to live as a people separated to their God, and from the world, specially at the Lord's Table.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Ezekias, 1590-1675.
